abstract: Some bloggers have found Nike’s new shoe - designed specifically for American Indians - off-putting.   Nike said it aimed to promote a healthy lifestyle on reservations.
snippet: Some bloggers have found Nike’s new shoe - designed specifically for American Indians - off-putting.   Nike said it aimed to promote a healthy lifestyle on reservations.
lead_paragraph: When Nike recently introduced a shoe designed specifically for American Indians, the company said it was to promote a healthy lifestyle on reservations.

headline.main: Nike Adds Indian Artifacts to Its Swoosh
headline.print_headline: To the Nike Swoosh, Add Indian Artifacts
